con:method.name: Get automated execution extenders of automated suites
Create automated suite from iteration test plan items
Create automated suite from test suite

con:request.name: without CUF
con:request.con:request:
{ "_type" : "campaign", "name" : "Campaign Testdfghfghjj", "reference" : "ABCDfe", "status" : "PLANNED", "description" : "

Sed eget rhoncus sapien. Nam et pulvinar nisi. su Do

", "scheduled_start_date" : "2021-08-31T22:00:00.000+0000", "scheduled_end_date" : "2031-09-29T22:00:00.000+0000", "actual_start_date" : "2034-09-29T22:00:00.000+0000", "actual_end_date" : "2035-09-29T22:00:00.000+0000", "actual_start_auto" : false, "actual_end_auto" : false, "parent" : { "_type" : "project", "id" : 1 } }

con:request.name: with CUF
without CUF
con:request.con:request:
{ "_type" : "campaign", "name" : "Campaign Test number1", "reference" : "ABCD", "status" : "IN_PROGRESS", "description" : "

Sed eget rhoncus sapien. Nam et pulvinar nisi. su Do

", "scheduled_start_date" : "2021-08-31T22:00:00.000+0000", "scheduled_end_date" : "2031-09-29T22:00:00.000+0000", "actual_start_date" : "2034-09-29T22:00:00.000+0000", "actual_end_date" : "2035-09-29T22:00:00.000+0000" }

con:method.name: Create execution for iteration test plan item

con:request.name: with custom fields
without custom fields
con:request.con:request:
{ "_type" : "execution", "custom_fields" : [], "test_case_custom_fields" : [], "execution_status" : "RUNNING", "comment" : "

the comment was modified...

", "prerequisite" : "

impossible modification of the prerequisite

" }

con:request.name: With custom parameters
con:request.con:request:
{ "_type" : "iteration", "name" : "new iteration4", "reference" : "NEW_IT", "description" : "

A new iteration

", "parent" : { "_type" : "campaign", "id" : 2 }, "scheduled_start_date" : "2017-04-09T22:00:00.000+0000", "scheduled_end_date" : "2017-04-14T23:00:00.000+0000", "actual_start_date" : "2017-04-10T22:00:00.000+0000", "actual_end_date" : "2017-04-15T22:00:00.000+0000", "actual_start_auto" : false, "actual_end_auto" : true, "custom_fields" : [ { "code" : "CUF1", "label" : "CUF1", "value" : "value of A" } ] }

con:request.name: Modify an Iteration
con:request.con:request:
{ "_type" : "patched iteration", "name" : "new iteration12", "reference" : "NEW_IT", "description" : "

A new iteration

", "parent" : { "_type" : "campaign", "id" : 2 }, "scheduled_start_date" : "2017-04-09T22:00:00.000+0000", "scheduled_end_date" : "2017-04-14T23:00:00.000+0000", "actual_start_date" : "2017-04-10T22:00:00.000+0000", "actual_end_date" : "2017-04-15T22:00:00.000+0000", "actual_start_auto" : false, "actual_end_auto" : true }

con:request.con:request:

do something meaningful

", "template_id" : 3, "params" : { "copyPermissions" : true, "copyCUF" : true, "copyBugtrackerBinding" : true, "copyAutomatedProjects" : true, "copyInfolists" : true, "copyMilestone" : true, "copyAllowTcModifFromExec" : true } }
